info.name: Stardust Butterfly
info.attribution:
An original game by Zoql available under CC BY-SA-NC 4.0. Thanks to meBID (programming), BIG_FROG (ending art), Ly (art), and rust dogg (playtesting). Adapted for use on virtualtabletop.io by LawDawg96. Some icons were based off of icons by Lorc and Delapouite available under CC By 3.0 on https://game-icons.net.

For more information and additional versions of the game, see https://zoql.itch.io/stardustbutterfly.
info.description: Take turns drafting from 9 action cards. During play, use special power of action card and roll dice to purchase weapons cards, move location of ship, increase skills, and hunt wanted criminals. Play 6 rounds. Player with most points at end wins.

7067ae85-da61-4384-b2dc-32d14e042b7b.text: Research reduces a target's number. 1 research = -1 (must be placed on a contracted target)

6655176d-11a3-4a33-a01b-e57327a2e50f.text: Instead of performing an action, you may instead gain 2 cc.

1c687ee3-40ea-4314-81fc-4689d856b124.text: If on same planet, target is -3 and +2 pts on success

fields.text: This will reset the board. Are you sure?

type1.name: Command
type1.effect: Take the first player marker (1pt at end of game)
type1.label: command_a.png

type3.name: Capture
type3.effect: Attempt a hit on a contracted target
type3.label: capture_a.png

type4.name: Warp
type4.effect: Move the ship to another planet. You may flush the market
type4.label: warp_a.png

type6.name: Purchase
type6.effect: Roll 1d6 and gain 2x that much money. You may buy cards from the market
type6.label: purchase_a.png

type7.name: Investigate
type7.effect: Roll 2d6 and apply that much research to a contracted target
type7.label: investigate_a.png

type1.text2: Roll 1d6. The ship will Warp to that planet (1=A, 2=B, etc. 6=nothing happens). Flush the market
type1.label: event1-1.png

type2.text2: In turn order, each player attempts a hit on a target in the target row. Ignore any target effects. (Hit targets are discarded and replaced.)
type2.label: event1-2.png

type3.text2: Each player rolls 2d6. The group gains money equal to the total, split evenly (discard excess)
type3.label: event1-3.png

type4.text2: Each player rolls 1d6 and gains the pts equal to their own result
type4.label: event1-4.png

type1.text2: Each player attempts a hit on a discarded target in turn order. Attempted targets cannot be attempted again
type1.label: event2-1.png

type2.text2: Each player rolls their dice pool. The player with the lowest loses all their money but gains a die.
type2.label: event2-2.png

type3.text2: Each player rolls their dice pool. The player with the highest result gets 2pts from each other player. The other players gain 1d6
type3.label: event2-3.png

type4.text2: Each player spends an amount of money then rolls 2d6. The player who rolls the highest gets points equal to the total money spent.
type4.label: event2-4.png

type1.text2: Each player gains 1pt for each $ they have
type1.label: event3-1.png

type2.text2: Each player rolls 3d6. The player with the lowest number cannot win the game
type2.label: event3-2.png

type3.text2: Each player performs one final Capture action if possible
type3.label: event3-3.png

type4.text2: The player who has successfully hit Averagmus gains 10 points.
type4.label: event3-4.png

fields.text: This will flush the market. Are you sure?
This will end the round and recall the action cards. Are you sure?
